page.title: 18SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: In our area there is a centre called Folly Court where they train guide dogs.The centre is situated in Blagrove Lane.They raise money by collecting aluminium foil and selling it to melt down for spares for cars etc.Also they collect stamps to sell to foreign countries.They use mainly pedigree females such as german shepherd dogs,labradors and retrievers. Some dogs are donated.They are taken to big towns and cities where they are trained and get used to get used to traffic. They go back to Folly Court to do reassessment training.
